Introducing an extensible editor

Blogr features an exceedingly intuitive interface which lets you focus on one thing : creating content. The editor supports management of multiple blogs and allows easy manipulation of embeds such as images, videos, Markdown. Extensibilty with plugins and themes provide easy ways to add functionality or change the looks of the blog

Robust content management

Flexible content management enables users to easily move through posts. Increase the usability of your blog by adding customized categories, sections, format or flow. With this functionality, you're in full control.
